value.name: EXAMPLE
value.description: The set of resources associated with a particular Device (example with Communication and CommunicationRequest resourses only).
value.purpose: Provides an example of a FHIR compartment definition based on the Device resource type.

resource.documentation: The device used as the message sender and recipient

x-codeSamples.source:
#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/compartmentdefinition-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/CompartmentDefinition \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"CompartmentDefinition","id":"7e5d793f-4d39-45ef-b555-fba333d063b3","url":"http://hl7.org/fhir/CompartmentDefinition/example","name":"EXAMPLE","status":"draft","experimental":true,"date":"2017-02-24T08:00:00+08:00","publisher":"Health Level Seven International (FHIR Infrastructure)","contact":[{"name":"[string]","telecom":[{"system":"url","value":"http://hl7.org/fhir"}]}],"description":"The set of resources associated with a particular Device (example with Communication and CommunicationRequest resourses only).","useContext":[{"code":{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/usage-context-type","code":"focus"},"valueCodeableConcept":{"coding":[{"system":"http://hl7.org/fhir/resource-types","code":"Device"}]}}],"purpose":"Provides an example of a FHIR compartment definition based on the Device resource type.","code":"Device","search":true,"resource":[{"code":"Communication","param":["sender","recipient"],"documentation":"The device used as the message sender and recipient"},{"code":"CommunicationRequest","param":["sender","recipient"],"documentation":"The device used as the message sender and recipient"}],"meta":{"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:15.183+08:00"}}'
